content: Stefano Ermon Stefano Ermon Home CV Teaching Awards Publications GitHub Personal Stefano Ermon     Follow Me Associate Professor Department of Computer Science Stanford University Office: Gates Building #330 Phone: (650) 498-9942 Email: ermon AT cs.stanford.edu Group Website       Research Blog About Me I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Stanford University. I am affiliated with the Artificial Intelligence Lab. I am also a fellow of the Woods Institute for the Environment. My research is in machine learning and generative AI. I like to develop principled methods motivated by concrete real-world applications and problems of broad societal relevance.
